mapper.sql: pid, publisher, created_time, closed_time, state, name, field, language, description
mapper.update: update project set publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, closed_time = #{closedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, field = #{field,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
closed_time = #{closedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
field = #{field,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM Project
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
field = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
name LIKE #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR description LIKE #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
